content:
Hi all, we're planning on holding an mCODE Connectathon Track Orientation on Wednesday, 9/4 at 10:00AM ET:

mCODE Connectathon Track Orientation
Wed, Sep 4, 2019 10:00AM - 10:30 AM EST

Please join the meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/116193445

You can also dial in using your phone.
United States: +1 (786) 535-3211
Access Code: 116-193-445

We will cover:

  • Connectathon Participation
  • Scenario Walkthroughs

The mCODE Track details are available here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2019-09+mCODE+Cancer+Interoperability+Track
